summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for the acute lower respiratory infection (ALRI) component of the health simulation framework, setting up dummy modules, configuring populations, and exercising various scenarios such as disease incidence, treatment pathways, consumable availability, and mortality outcomes to verify model behavior.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the ALRI simulation logic so that policymakers and researchers can rely on accurate predictions of disease burden, treatment effects, and health system resource impacts.
